about_the_game:
EvilTrap

Prepare for an unnerving adventure in EvilTrap, an open-world psychological survival horror game where every playthrough offers a fresh nightmare. Stranded on a desolate island, you'll face relentless supernatural threats as you scavenge for essential supplies and navigate a world teeming with danger.



Key Features:

  • Dynamic Horror Experience: Each game session is uniquely terrifying with 90% of jump scares being entirely random, ensuring that no two encounters are ever the same.

  • Adaptive AI: The island’s malevolent intelligence relentlessly tracks your progress, but it’s not the only thing lurking in the shadows. Stay vigilant as both the environment and the AI adapt to your strategies.

  • Survival Mechanics: To endure, you'll need to manage your hunger, find rest, and craft essential tools like traps and safe havens. Balance resource gathering with the constant threat of the unknown.

  • Atmospheric Open World: Immerse yourself in a richly detailed and eerie environment. The island's vast, haunting landscapes are designed to keep you on edge as you uncover its dark secrets.

EvilTrap challenges you to confront your fears in a world where every corner holds a new threat and survival depends on your ability to adapt and overcome.

More From Jeff Winner

name: EvilTrap

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bits
  • Processor: Core i3 Intel or AMD processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 or AMD Radeon™ RX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: This Game Doesn't Support VR
  • Additional Notes: Minimum spec screen resolution: 1280x720
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)/Windows 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-7700 CPU @ 3.60GHz | or AMD equivalent or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1080 With 8GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: This Game Doesn't Support VR
  • Additional Notes: Spec Screen Resolution 1440p to 4k

short_description: EvilTrap is an open-world Psychological/Survivor Horror Game. Fight off supernatural threats on a deserted island while scavenging for crucial supplies.
